name: IncrediBots 3 Saved Challenge File
summary: Learn about .IB3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: IncrediBots 3 does not natively save files with the extension ".ib3." Instead, when the user chooses to save a challenge, IncrediBots provides a text string that can be copied into a plain text file. While the .TXT extension could be used, a recommended extension is ".ib3."

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
